about_the_game:
Comrade, meet Sector Clear: Hryaken Destroy , where your mission is crystal clear: annihilate the Hryaken swine army and cleanse the territory until not a single pig remains! You’ll face endless randomly generated fields, with every move bringing you closer to victory—or defeat. This isn’t just a puzzle game—it’s a battle for survival.

Your arsenal? Strategic thinking and unconventional power-ups hidden in everyday objects. Forget airstrikes and heavy bombs; here, pots of geraniums act as your "strike drones," while legendary pots of tulips mimic the firepower of the mighty Tulip mortars from great combat operations.

Key Features:

✅ Endless Cleaning : No levels, just random fields that keep challenging your mind over and over again.

✅ Pots as Weapons : Deploy pots of geraniums for precise target destruction and unleash pots of tulips for massive area-of-effect damage against enemies.

✅ Real-Time Recon Data : Receive enemy coordinates dynamically and plan your moves carefully. Your strategy will be the key to success.

✅ Increasing Difficulty : The further you go, the more enemies appear on the field. Only true tacticians can withstand this pressure.

✅ Dark Humor & References : Pots of flowers instead of heavy artillery? Of course, it's war—but a touch of absurdity never hurt anyone.

Why Play Sector Clear: Hryaken Destroy ?

This isn’t just another Match-3 game—it’s a test of your wits and patience. There are no predictable levels or repetitive patterns here. Every round is a new challenge, new enemies, and new opportunities for triumph.

Remember: "They're just pigs, nothing more, nothing less." But even pigs can be dangerous... if you let them win.

Defend your territory, use every resource at your disposal, and show Hryaken what happens when they underestimate the power of potted plants.

name: Sector clear: Hryaken destroy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8
  • Processor: Intel Atom 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Sector Clear: Hryaken Destroy – Endless Tactical Sweeping of Enemy Swine Forces in an Action-Packed Match-3 Game!
